subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Islanders center Mike Sillinger will have season-ending hip surgery within the next week. Sillinger, 36, has not played since Feb. 5, and is in the second season of a three-year deal that pays him $2.2 million this season and $2.3 million for 2008-9. He has 14 goals and 12 assists this season. Sillinger, who has played 134 games with the Islanders, has 238 goals and 546 points in 1,042 games over 17 N.H.L. seasons.
